TheseAreComments!.Comment: 'PatchBlockSize' must be set 32K, other block size has not been supported yet!
'FotaMemSize' is not the entire customized FOTA zone in flash but the one only for delta downloading!
'attr' in 'ImageMem' must be set with one of these choices('BINPKG/BL/AP/CP/APP/APP2'), which is forbidden to be redefined!
However, other fields can be redefined to whatever you want, including the name of this config file!
